title: The Basque derby - the friendliest rivalry in world football?
desc: With a sense of shared identity and fans mixing in the stands, is the Basque derby between Athletic Club and Real Sociedad the friendliest in the world?

title: Iran warns of regional conflict if US decides to attack
desc: The comment follows US President Donald Trump telling reporters aboard Air Force One that Iran is "seriously" talking to the US and hinted at a deal to avoid military strikes.

title: Iran in 'serious discussions' with US, Trump says, as military threat looms
desc: Iran is expected to begin a live-fire naval exercise in the Strait of Hormuz, a key shipping route.

title: 25-Year-Old Nigerian Singer, Ifunanya ‘Nanyah’, Dies After Snakebite Over Lack of Anti-Venom In Abuja Hospitals
desc: Ifunanya Nwangene, a 25-year-old Abuja-based classical, jazz, RnB, and soul singer, popularly known by her stage name Nanyah, has reportedly passed away after suffering a snake bite at her residence in the early hours of the morning. SaharaReporters gathered that the incident occurred at her home in Abuja when a snake attacked her, inflicting a bite that later proved fatal.

title: Myanmar junta calls coup-protesting civil servants back to work
desc: After the military snatched power in a coup on Feb 1, 2021, tens of thousands of public workers, including doctors and government administrators, left their posts in a surge of civil disobedience.
